summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Scio Verum Corporation for the period of May 1, 2015, to May 31, 2015. It details the account's transactions, including deposits, withdrawals, and the ending balance, as well as the relationship manager's contact information.

persons.name: Helene Tolentino
persons.context: Helene Tolentino is identified as the relationship manager for the business account of Scio Verum Corporation.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Scio Verum Corporation.
The statement covers the period from May 1, 2015, to May 31, 2015.
The ending balance of the account on May 31, 2015, was $27,549.96.
Total withdrawals during the period amounted to $61,745.11.
Total deposits during the period amounted to $53,063.45.
